#summary addXXX(...)
#labels api,0.9

*Category*:

[ModelObjectFunctions Model Object Functions]

*Description*:

Dynamic shortcut method, replace `XXX` with the name of an association you have set up through [hasMany hasMany()].

*Examples*:

{{{
<!--- a "hasMany" association from "owner" to "car" is required --->
<cfset anOwner = model("owner").findByKey(params.ownerId)>
<cfset aCar = model("car").findByKey(params.carId)>
<cfset anOwner.addCar(aCar)>
}}}

{{{
<!--- a "hasMany" association from "owner" to "car" is required --->
<cfset anOwner = model("owner").findByKey(params.ownerId)>
<cfset anOwner.addCar(1)>
}}}

 * [hasMany hasMany()] (function)
